A little about me

While studying at University of California, Santa Cruz I first interned at BlackRock, Inc. as Front End Engineer. After Recieving my Bachelors of Arts I went back to BlackRock, Inc. full time where I served several roles. Cloud Natives Engineer, Full Stack Engineer, and Front End Engineer.

I do amazing things for clients

UX Designer

As a UX Designer my role that blends visual design skills, writing, coding, and research. As a UX designer, you'll be designing apps, building prototypes, and performing testing and analytics as well as collaborating with clients and other teams.

Web Developer

As a web developer build and maintain websites and web applications, using programming, design tools, and languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to meet both client and end-user needs.

Front-end

As a Front-end Developer I am responsible for developing new user-facing features, determining the structure and design of web pages, building reusable codes, optimizing page loading times, and using a variety of markup languages to create the web pages.

High quality webdesign

As a web designer, I take immense pride in delivering high-quality web design solutions to my clients. I am able to create visually appealing and user-friendly websites that effectively represent their brand. I focus on crafting a seamless user experience by incorporating intuitive navigation, responsive design, and engaging visuals. Furthermore, I ensure that the website adheres to industry standards and best practices, making it accessible, fast-loading, and optimized for search engines. Through continuous collaboration and communication with the client, I guarantee that their vision is translated into an exceptional web design that not only meets their expectations but also exceeds them.


Supporting The Community

I have been volunteering my coding skills to help local nonprofits improve their online visibility and generate products of their choosing. I believe that using my technical abilities to give back to the community is one of the best ways to make a difference, and I am passionate about using technology to address social issues. Working with these nonprofits has been a rewarding experience, as I have been able to help them develop effective websites, apps, and other digital tools that have enabled them to reach a wider audience and better serve their communities. Through my volunteer work, I have learned how to collaborate effectively with others, how to prioritize tasks, and how to use my skills to make a positive impact on the world around me.


Embodying Deversity and Inclusion

I have embodied inclusion and diversity by serving on the OUT Executive Committee and being the pillar of the Social Policy Expert. I also helped plan and execute several company-wide events that celebrated our differences and fostered a sense of community and belonging. Through my efforts, I am proud to say that our workplace culture has become more inclusive, respectful, and supportive. I firmly believe that diversity and inclusion are not only essential for creating a positive work environment, but they also drive innovation and success. I am eager to continue championing these values in all that I do.
